There was one other sighting in Blue Springs on or around May 30th 2012
Summary: A star like disoriented path taken right after a few lightning strikes a star like feature jetting around the sky I have video
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and his friend and i were taking video of lightning when we saw the star like light fly and flutter in light faster than anything I ever seen before....im an aviation maintenance student and study flight characteristics every day...I can't explain what it is ..we have video evidence of the event I have the video and so does my sons friend I just can't figure out how to Attach it
